content: this legal case involves a divorce and the termination of coownership between two parties the court ruled that one party is responsible for covering the procedural costs but the specific amount was not mentioned the case lasted for 2 years and 7 months the court decision referred to as court dec states that the property will be put up for public auction with a starting price of 7000 euros and the proceeds will be divided equally among the coowners the judgment will be sent to the parties and will come into effect after being registered by jõhvi municipality if either party is not satisfied with the decision they have the right to appeal to tartu district court within 30 days the lawsuit was filed by one party against the other and it involves a marriage that ended in 2012 the plaintiff has been trying to terminate the coownership but the defendant has refused to discuss it the court has made efforts to deliver necessary documents to the defendant and after several attempts the documents were successfully delivered in may 2023 a court hearing was held in november 2022 where the plaintiff presented their claims the court granted a divorce and addressed the termination of coownership the court decision is based on the civil code which allows a coowner to demand the termination of coownership the court also determines the distribution of procedural costs
